input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product name information.

Product name:
Reynolds Freezer Paper 150 Sq. Ft. (Pack of 6)

Product features:
Plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes
Easy-to-write-on surface
Plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing
Buy food in bulk and save money

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Looking for a deal!  This REYNOLDS FREEZER PAPER 150 Sq. Ft comes in a pack of 6!  Reynolds Freezer Paper is a plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and for general household purposes. The paper gives the product strength and durability as well as an easy-to-write-on surface, while the plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing.  In these tough times this will save you money in the long run, if you buy in bulk and freeze.
input_text.Response B: Reynolds Freezer Paper is a plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes. The plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor, and nutrition of foods during freezing. The easy-to-write-on surface makes it convenient to write the name of the item and the date purchased directly on the paper before freezing. Reynolds Freezer Paper is available in a variety of sizes, so you can buy food in bulk and save money. The package comes with 150 square feet of paper, which is enough to wrap several bulk food purchases.
